28483.summary: Some customers in the Cloverdale area of Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28483.title: Nov 4 – Surrey (Cloverdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
